intro.title: Hi! I'm Nekodigi.
intro.body:
I have been making art, applications, etc for 8 years. Recently, I have been focusing on web application development. My dream is to create applications that many people useğŸ˜
Nice to meet you all!

myProjects.title: My Projects
myProjects.body:
Here's an app you can try right now!
If you want to see all my work, please visit my Youtube or blog.

projects.title: Creative Magic
projects.body: The culmination of three years of learning generative art. High-quality art on your smartphone too.

projects.title: Pinyin OCR
projects.body: An extension that displays Chinese Pinyin with just one click. One tool for both character recognition from images and translation.

projects.title: Artifact Sim
projects.body: An unique app that predicts the final score of artifacts. Make Genshin Impact even more enjoyable.

projects.title: Web Answer Sheet
projects.body: Efficient TOEIC preparation with a paperless answer sheet! A web app born from the struggles of active students.

projects.title: Chat Blog
projects.body: A website where you can post from a LINE Bot. Easily share information even for IT beginners.

projects.title: LINE GPT
projects.body: Use ChatGPT on LINE. A recommended service for developers who want to add their own commands.

socialMedia.title: Social Media
socialMedia.body:
A lot more content available on social media like Youtube and Github!
If you find my activities interesting, please visit themğŸ‘.

socialMedias.title: Youtube
socialMedias.body: Art that focuses on appearance and technical interest.

socialMedias.title: Github
socialMedias.body: Free source code for almost all web apps/art and other works.

socialMedias.title: Blog (JP)
socialMedias.body: A wide range of behind the scenes of development and other interests.

socialMedias.title: Google Play
socialMedias.body: Works that focus on interactive experiences that cannot be experienced in videos.

skill.title: Skill
skill.body:
This is a list of technologies used in development.
Please use it as a reference for your own development and work requests.

contact.title: Contact
contact.body:
Use youtube comments for faster reply. Twitter and email are also available.
 I'd love to hear your thoughts on the app and any ideas for future products you'd like me to make!
